Breakout

Github Hosted

Breakout is a game made with the Unity engine.

The game was created with a three-person team over the course of two months. The AI was trained to play using machine learning through the ML-Agents library, which provides an interface between Unity and Tensorflow.

A title screen video for the game was created in Blender.

The interfaces were created with Adobe XD and Blender.

Players can play single player, multiplayer against the AI, or watch AI play solo.

The AI was trained in parallel instances to increase training speed.
